name: Run Foxy, Run!
description: Your fox friends was caught by poachers and imprisoned in cages. However, Ginger managed to escape. Now he has come to the camp to rescue the others. You have to go through a series of tests to set free your friends. To do this, catch the crows that carry cheese. Having collected the right amount, she will bring the key to the cage from them. By freeing all your friends, you get access to an endless challenge. Choose your style of play, overcome obstacles and set highscores.
